title: Jupiter Transit in the 8th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Jupiter transits the 8th house for Scorpio Ascendant, growth occurs through transformation, research, and deeper understanding of shared resources. This phase supports healing, insight into hidden matters, and wise handling of joint finances, taxes, or inheritances. Interest in psychology, spirituality, or occult knowledge increases. However, overreliance on luck or moral justification in risky matters can backfire. When used consciously, this transit strengthens resilience, recovery, and meaningful inner evolution.
closing: This Jupiter transit guides Scorpio Ascendant through deep transformation with wisdom. Growth is sustained by discernment and balance.
